name: Return_Chapter0
description:
Return_Chapter0 is the free portion of a currently in development game. The full version will feature the chunky, fast paced shooting mechanics of an old school shooter, while taking place across a series of dungeons, featuring the environmental puzzles/item use of a Zelda game. Chapter0 will continue to evolve alongside the main game, and will serve as a testing ground to develop and showcase new features as they are added, giving people the opportunity to play around with them within a sandbox environment while providing simple tasks to accomplish as they move through the level.

CONTROLS

WASD - move

Space - Jump

Shift - Walk

LMB - Shoot

RMB - grappling hook

E - interact

Q - last used weapon

1,2,3 - change weapon

ESC - pause menu

COMING SOON

  • more varied enemy types, with unique strategies and attack patterns
  • new weapons/items
  • challenge maps with score tracking
  • more complete tutorial section
  • expanded options/settings menu
  • hub world with access to different maps

Game design and art by Carlo Sbisa
